channel.title: The Chronicles of China
channel.description: American actor Patric McInnis details his year abroad and explores a mysterious new culture in China.

item.title: The Arrival
item.description: In this first installment, Patric receives an all expenses paid scholarship to study acting...in China! Travel along with Patric to get a glimpse of his unique experience.
item.itunes:author: PAtric McInnes
